results.name: a(1)=4,  a(2)=3, a(n)=4*a(n-1) + 3*a(n-2)
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4, 3).
program: (Maxima) a[1]:4$ a[2]:3$ a[n]:=4*a[n-1]+3*a[n-2]$ makelist(a[n], n, 1, 24);  [Bruno Berselli, May 24 2011]
